snippet.title: Cleft lip more likely in babies of overweight moms
Doctors Urge More Playtime for Children
snippet.description: Here's some soothing medicine for stressed-out parents and overscheduled kids: The American Academy of Pediatrics says what children really need for healthy development is more good, old-fashioned playtime.
